title: The Work Resumes
summary: Encouraged by the prophets Haggai and Zechariah, the Jews resume rebuilding the temple. Tattenai, a Persian governor, questions their authority and writes to King Darius for clarification.

faq.question: Who inspired the people to start building again?
What did Tattenai do?
faq.answer: He sent a letter to King Darius asking whether the rebuilding was authorized.
